    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbxException.AlreadyOpen, DbxException.ApiUsage, DbxException.Exists, DbxException.InvalidParameter, DbxException.Network, DbxException.NetworkConnection, DbxException.NetworkTimeout, DbxException.NotFound, DbxException.Parent, DbxException.RecoverableSystem, DbxException.Server, DbxException.Ssl, DbxException.Unauthorized

    public class DbxException
extends java.io.IOException
    Base class for exceptions. Inner subtypes distinguish types of Exceptions so your app can respond appropriately.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
